website_summaries.verdict: An extremely durable, simple model for those who want a no-nonsense sorter for their laundry.
pros: Bags offer buyers a good amount of space for their laundry
The three bags are each removable so you can wash different colors at different times
Customers appreciate the color and look of this product
cons: Some buyers view the product as a little flimsy
Many customers complained about their smell, but claim it fades over time

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, functional hamper
customer_reviews.text: Updated: the company sent me a new hamper after seeing my 1st review. The new hamper is tight and straight. Looks like we got a defective one the first time. I'm glad the company took the time to right the issue, thank you! Love the clean simple design of this hamper. The hamper however it is crooked, the top and bottom bars don't line up. Anyone else have this issue?
customer_reviews.author: OrtizFamily

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected, all parts were there, easy to assemble with basic knowledge of directions, sturdy when built, hooks are strong and I like that they have a rubber coating so they don't slip around, total measurements are accurate, bags are heavy canvas, rolls easy or locks, bars at the bottom to support heavy bags, and each bag holds a full load of laundry if not a bit more. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Biscay

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Disappointed -  Product Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: SUPER disappointed with this laundry sorter. I was very excited to receive it considering all the great reviews, but I noticed the weakness/flimsiness in the product almost immediately. Once I put laundry in, it became clear that this product is not worth the $45 I paid for it. The product is composed of very flimsy chrome bars that don't hold up when there's laundry in the bags. I've attached an image of what my cart looks like with laundry in it. I definitely do not recommend this for the price -- there's nothing "Heavy-Duty" about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Vincint

customer_reviews.title: Chemical / Toxic Smell!
customer_reviews.text: TOXIC CHEMICAL SMELL!!! I purchased this after all of the great reviews and while the product functionality may work, the intense toxic / chemical smell when I first opened the box was enough to make me get a headache. Even after laundering the bag Twice and letting it air dry for days, the intense smell still will not go away. This is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: tar257

customer_reviews.title: Not Heavy-Duty
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find a heavy duty cart since the last few I bought were flimsy and fell apart quickly. When I got the package I was skeptical and once it was put together I was disappointed in the product. The tubes are segmented and thus automatically unstable as the segments wobble. Within an hour after adding clothes to the bag the cart was leaning dramatically. I tightened the screws again as tight as they would go and there is still so much lateral play that it pretty much makes this cart so unstable and useless. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Draela

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but manufacturer sourced wrong part
customer_reviews.text: I like how it goes together with the easy spring loaded pins, and I like the full size casters that roll smoothly. However, it came with the wrong size of plastic washers that are supposed to make the round frame attach to the flat tube ends. The white plastic washers are simply too small. They can't fit around the larger frame.
customer_reviews.author: Keegoid

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy & leans to one side
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a perfect laundry basket. I was excited when it arrived. I assembled it , following the instructions carefully. It was a bit wobbly, but it seemed okay. The first time I tried to roll it out of my closet, it leaned heavily to one side and it felt like it would collapse. Since then, its gotten increasingly unstable and now it always leans to one side & I have to prop it up against the wall to keep it standing. I'm disappointed, but I haven't reached out to the company - too busy lately. But, if anyone from DecoBros is listening - I'd appreciate a refund or a placement. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Matt W

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products I've purchased!
customer_reviews.text: It's now been over two years since I purchased this laundry sorter and I couldn't be more pleased! The old one was weak, loose, and always seemed like it was about to fall apart. So, I really wanted something sturdy and THIS is the product. I like that we can take out just one bag at a time to the washroom. The frame is tight, the wheels stayed locked, and it looks as good as the day it arrived. I don't often come back to do a review two years after a purchase but felt this one needed the positive feedback! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: KristinaKay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and put it together and I could not be happier. Product was easy to build. At first I thought some parts were missing but I think G on the instructions is already embedded in the ends of the metal tubes? Ignored G and product still seemed quite solid. I wasn't sure I wanted the wheels on it because I don't intend to move this around but I ended up putting them on because my husband pointed out that there are wheel locks and adding the wheels makes it sit a little higher. I own other Deco Brothers organizing products and they've been great quality. I can already see this item is of the same high quality.
customer_reviews.author: E Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but get your grease and tools out...
customer_reviews.text: Decent laundry cart. I have used for over 2 months now. Wheels and hardware are not top notch quality. One wheel was stuck and did not spin right out of the box. Had to be taking apart and greased. Cart needs constant tightening over time, but that is not a huge deal. Overall does what it is supposed to do but could be made of higher quality parts for price. Pros: Laundry bags made of thick canvas type material Neat way to organize laundry Separate bins make for quick sorting at washing machine Cons: Not highest quality parts
customer_reviews.author: Alicia MTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I love how functional and affordable it is, and it's really nice to be able to separate our lights from our whites from our darks. The wheels are smooth and easy to maneuver, the color is nice and neutral. Overall, it's a great, durable product. I will say, however, I wish the bags were easier to clean. Each one has the placement bars sewn into them, so you can't just throw them in the washer. But if your laundry isn't that stinky, it shouldn't be an issue. They don't absorb smell much.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Piece
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and a quality piece. It's going to work perfectly in my new laundry room, tucked under a counter top and rolled out when needed. The only thing, and this is not a significant complaint -- the metal structure is bronze, not chrome, even though the box said chrome. The bags are tan and not dark brown that would normally come with bronze. I am disappointed because everything else is shiny chrome in my new room, but not disappointed enough to return it. Very well made. 3 compartments have enough storage for our laundry. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: maryh22

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, if you have a single story house, get one of these for yourself. :) *!<3 so good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way for me to organize the laundry. The bags are a good size, but not HUGE. The wheels works well. I though it was VERY easy to put together. I had it for almost a year & actually enjoy using it. I have a small shelf that this cart fits under so I can put my clothes away & not have to see them until I need to wash. Also, having 3 compartments allows me to better sort by color, giving longevity to my clothing. I do use 2 other bins for linens, towels, cleaning rags, etc, but this cart is a key part of my Laundry system.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie C. Michael IV

customer_reviews.title: Strong and decent size to fit lots of clothes
customer_reviews.text: My wife and i love it. Easy to seperate white, black and color clothes and when need to wash just lift and take to washer. Pretty well built, and strong make sure to really tighten all screws when installing to insure it doesnt go to one side like some pictures and reviews ihave seen prior to buying. One thing i dont like was the bag smell little strong for the material i washed it and still smells im sure with time it will go away, other than that buy you wont be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: The arms we received were too short to reach across ...
customer_reviews.text: The arms we received were too short to reach across the width of the frame. They did not appear to be the arms pictured with the product. They had black rubber tops rather than the chrome pictured on the box. Customer service was quick to respond and ship another set of the identical hangers so two stars for that attempt. The frame is a pre defined width so I'm not sure how it could be assembled incorrectly. Gave me a new one that was the right shape. Everything fits great on new one. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gaines Slocum

customer_reviews.title: Laundry dream!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced three laundry baskets, cluttering my closet. I love this laundry cart! First I put this cart together by myself and it was very simple and great instructions. This has given me so much more room in my closet. It replaced three baskets and takes up much less space, but holds more clothes than the other three baskets did. The sorter bags are sturdy and strong. A full bag is a very full washer load for me. This truly will change the way you look at laundry. So much more organized! Should have bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry sorter.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, works great. The bags have a very strong smell when they're first opened, but it disappeared after a few days. Both the frame and the bags seem sturdy - no sign of wear and tear from occasionally pressing down the laundry into the bag. I don't usually roll it, instead I lift the bag out and dump onto a table to sort out lights and darks. The three separate bags have helped my partner and I to sort laundry (regular/cold water, regular/hot water, and permanent press) before doing a load, which has made it easier to stay on top of laundry in general. I wish I'd thought to buy this thing years ago.
customer_reviews.author: R. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd call "heavy duty"!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping since this is called "heavy duty" it would be real good quality. The sorter is fine but not what i'd call heavy duty. The metal is not extra thick or sturdy. I'm having trouble figuring out what actually is heavy duty about it! It is relatively easy to assemble but mine leans to the left very badly and will not stand up straight even when empty. also the 3 sorters are quite a bit smaller than i thought they would be. They work alright but don't hold a lot of laundry. Overall it's fine and will work but I'm thinking i'll end up replacing with something else in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: A must for my childen
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these laundry sorting hampers for our children and it's helped with keeping their clothing sorted. I use to have to beg them to sort their clothes and this helps alleviate that constant battle with them. Sure, a random color gets in with the darks but that's okay. I like that the bags are portable and can be carried separately to the laundry room if needed. The cart is sturdier than the one I purchased from a name store too. My husband assembled them and he did not have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: JetNoise

customer_reviews.title: Tilts to one side, but is otherwise great for a single-person home.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this the second I moved into a building with a public laundry area. I'm very pleased with the quality and size of the bags as a single-user who works and goes to the gym daily. I think it might be a bit small for a multi-person home. It rolls smoothly and has had only a few hiccups getting into and out of the elevator. As other users have noted, it has started to lean to one side over time since the attachment points between pieces aren't the most reliable. I personally keep a small screwdriver close-by and tighten up a few loose screws every now and then and that is working well for the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Moderate quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality was less than I was hoping for, given that this is kind of a mid-range price for this product. Despite retightening the screws a second time a few weeks after I started using it, it just doesn't seem tight. The whole thing slants if I have 2 full compartments. I have never had all 3 compartments full, because I'm worried that it would break. Other than that, I like that you can take out each compartment if you need to, and that there are handles on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy A.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace our current laundry sorter that was falling apart. It was easy to put together, and even thought the bags were a little more shallow that our previous sorter, the size of the bags more that makes up for that. We love that the bags sit on the rails instead of some other sorters that have slots to insert the handles on the bags. We also love that the handles will come out easy if we need to remove them. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product for laundry organization
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry sorter. I has made my life so much easier. I section full to the top is almost exactly a load. Carry the bag downstairs, dump the contents in the washer, preso, I'm done. If only I could get my husband to use his... How many times do I have to say that the washer is NOT your personal hamper?? At least once more, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria AndrewsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not quite heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: Not quite heavy duty. Had for only a week did my first load and pushed cart then the whole cart shifted forward as if something broke. Now it leans forward every time I push it. Starting to question when the reviews are so good on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nina H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Even better service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Even better service. Been using this bag for 2 years and just now had a bag rip. They took care of the bag, no questions asked (not a defect, my kids yanked it getting their laundry out of the cart) Great product, holds all the laundry for a week for my family of four with two of these bags. No more sorting on laundry day, making laundry go so much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Laundry Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I like this cart very much. I put it together in my bedroom, then wheeled it into my (very small) laundry room where it will stay. Each evening I place my clothing that needs to be washed into the designated bag. I can keep running tabs on how much laundry is accumulating and more easily plan when I can slip the time into my schedule. (This also eliminates the 3 piles of clothing that would invariably accumulate on my bedroom floor). The cart is sturdy. The individual bags are not too heavy to lift out to transfer the clothes to the washing machine. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CatLady

customer_reviews.title: Helps Nix Messy Habits!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that these bags arrived a different color- they do not have a white side on them. I've always been convinced that organization products won't change your life, because they won't change anything until you change your messy habits. But this one makes it SO easy to change your habits! I use mine for Dirty, 'to fold' and 'to hang up', which really helps keep everything in one place, and organized until I have the time to put everything in its real place!
customer_reviews.author: Molly D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited space
customer_reviews.text: We needed to compact space for our laundry because we are stuck living out of a bedroom and have a newborn as well. So every inch of space in our room counts and needs to be used as compact as possible. This works great in saving us the hassle of having different baskets laying around for towels, baby clothes and our clothes. Assembly was easy, just a lot of small pieces to assemble. The hooks on the bags works great and is convenient for taking the bags right off and straight to the laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Burns

customer_reviews.title: Really stinky, but gorgeous and functional
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this hamper stunk to high heaven when we assembled it. We could smell it from our bed for about a week. It was a really odd chemical smell that seems to have faded but not disappeared entirely. Despite the smell, this is a huge improvement over the broken hamper that we were using before. The wheels have a lock function in case you're worried about it getting knocked about. This wheeled hamper is ideal for when we need to do our laundry on the first floor of our building. Just pack the detergent and dryer sheets along with the laundry and wheel away. This would get five s
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Well-engineered
customer_reviews.text: I've just started using it but, so far, so good. I had a little bit of trouble putting it together but it is well-engineered. I'm going from memory but it seemed like one type of part was not to scale in the diagram (I think the picture showed it much smaller) so that's the only reason I didn't immediately snap it together). I've never had a laundry sorter so this is good to have. I am not bothered by the smell that some reviewers have mentioned. I have a sensitive nose but it just smelled faintly of plastic but the smell dissipated quickly. If I have an issue with it's durability later I'll update the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Database Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Convenience on wheels!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my closet and we toss our clothes into their various assigned compartments as we shed them. Extremely convenient and easy to use. The sorter easily rolls on carpet or tile to the laundry room. We even put our empty clothes hangers on the top bar so I don't have to search for hangers as the clothes come out of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: who struggles with arthritic conditions and needed something to move the dirty laundry from the closet area to the laundry room
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife, who struggles with arthritic conditions and needed something to move the dirty laundry from the closet area to the laundry room. This has turned out to be the perfect answer. The bags allow her to sort the various loads (whites, colors, etc) and then roll them to the laundry room. The larger wheels allow the cart to roll on carpet better than some other products which have tiny wheels. And they are lockable. The unit is relatively easy to assemble and sturdy, to support the 3 bags. The handles on the bags allow her to lift the items out of the cart when loading the washing machine. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Retired Olde Farte

customer_reviews.title: I got more than my money worth!!!
customer_reviews.text: More impressive than expected. Canvas bags are sturdy, the hardware (frame) polished, just beautiful. I feel that I got more than my money worth. I’m not sure if it’s capacity (how many pounds of laundry each canvas bag can hold). I will get back to you, the item arrived today. They say that it takes only 5 minutes to assemble, not quite, more like 15-20 minutes, ladies! Putting it together was easy, everything snapped in place.
customer_reviews.author: 1 soul casual

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Cart was easy to assemble and became surprisingly sturdy after all screws were tightened. So far I have used it for about two weeks moving it around on a fairly uneven cement floor without experiencing any leaning like other customers noticed. The only problem I had during assembly was with the thin wrench included to tighten the wheels: it spread open and became useless. If (when) the wheels become loose I will need to add some full-sized nuts to the threads and tighten them with a real wrench. Overall it serves the purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Der alte Fritz

customer_reviews.title: NOT heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my laundry room is in the basement and living on the 7th floor was a pain. Expected this to be a game changer. Yes, it is more convenient, but, it is very cheaply made. I stuff that thing full before I do laundry and it’s alrwsy started warping and falling apart. There is not a strong structure to hold this thing together. It’s very flimsy and I don’t feel like it’s going to last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to put together, expecting it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means mechanically inclined. I was able to put this together in under 30 minutes with no difficulty at all. I bought this hamper to keep the clothes off the floor in front of the washer (and the cat off the clothes). It's great! As laundry builds, I sort it as we go (whites, medium, darks). When it's full, I run a load. The only thing is, if you are grabbing a lot of laundry out of any one bag, the bag tends to lift up with it, so you have to unload the individual hanging bags a little bit at a time. Otherwise this is a great, sturdy unit.
customer_reviews.author: CTAnnie

customer_reviews.title: Solid little cart
customer_reviews.text: Good laundry cart. Wheels are solid and rolls well. Holds a good amount of laundry, 3 full loads without issue. I would give it more stars, but one of the connecting pieces, where it screws in was bent in at an angle, making it hard to attach that one section. That one side has a serious lean to it. The other was the instructions/packaging. I felt like things could have been labeled better or some written instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Erin E.

customer_reviews.title: Oily smell
customer_reviews.text: Cart is crooked, which, considering the price, I don't mind to much What I can't stand is the oily smell that persists after leaving the cart outside for two weeks straight. I've had it now for three weeks, it is inside now because we had rain in the forecast, and it still smells like oil. You don't have to put any effort in to see if you can smell it Maybe I got one that wasn't washed before shipping I'll probably throw this away in a week
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Heavy quality, and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Really heavy construction, and attractive laundry set. It is quite large, so be sure to measure your space. It is actually a bit large for my laundry room, so I ended-up keeping it just outside the laundry room door. This surprising has been a great development, as it leaves the laundry room open and clear, and I can easily glide the cart in to load up the washer, and then wheel it back out. Would buy again, even though it's larger than planned!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but will dispute previous reviews on the material
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, but will dispute previous reviews on the material. It is actually not all canvas. The inside is indeed vinyl coated to make it waterproof. Makes it hard to wash. I wanted something that was all canvas and more breathable, because wet cleaning rags left in the holder for a week will grow black mold. Makes it hard to bleach with the vinyl. I've done it before and it just destroys the material. Once these wear out, I will be back on the hunt for all canvas material.
customer_reviews.author: Rojer

customer_reviews.title: Updated review...
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2-9-16 After having this for a few months I'm a little less satisfied with it. It just doesn't seem to HD up to the laundry load for a family of 6 (5 being males). It's always leaning one direction or another and I'm constantly having to take a screwdriver to it to tighten up the screws. It still does the job, but I have to leave it leaning on a wall if it's any kind of full. I did a ton of research before settling on this one. I'm so glad I did. It's simple to put together (even with a 1 year old "helping") and Super sturdy. It has an awesome capacity too. Very easily 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for me, maybe for you too.
customer_reviews.text: Luckily, the bag fits well in my small townhouse walk-in closet as the picture is misleading. I picture something the size of hotel-sized bags but this is actually accommodating for single family users. each back fits a normal size load of laundry. You could not fit a king size down comforter in one of these so make sure you actually look into the dimensions and have an idea what the size is. It was perfect for me and the construction itself is very sturdy. This bag is meant to hold only the laundry load of 2 adults. buy more if you have other needs on other floors. I use it between my wife and I as colors whites and towels.
customer_reviews.author: RichMe1ster

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: Product wreaked of diesel and even after cleaning all the pieces with disinfectant cleaner and trying to clean the bags by hand (they are more plastic than fabric and cannot be machine washed), it still wreaks of diesel. I wish I had returned it, but now I am stuck with it. Do yourself a favor and keep looking. This looks good in the picture, but it literally stinks!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice laundry sorter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after my last laundry sorter fell apart. This one is much more sturdy and feels like it will last a long time. The wheels are more heavy duty than other plastic wheels and 2 of them lock. At first I didn't want one that you could remove each bag but now I find I like not having to roll the whole thing to the washer & dryer if I am only doing one load. The bags are made out of a thick fabric that doesn't feel like it would tear easily. I have been using it for a month or more and am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LeDoux fan

customer_reviews.title: this product was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Warning: this product reeks upon arrival. Give it about 5 days to air out to get rid of the odor of whatever petrochemical they used to coat the bags. Other than that, this product was easy to assemble, very sturdy, and works amazingly in my 1 story, mostly hard floor home. It goes easily over thresholds but is hard to wheel over carpet. The bag size is perfect for 1 load of laundry, and I've been using the side rails to transport hangers to the laundry room at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Katherin Daniels

customer_reviews.title: No more washday blues!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is absolutely perfect. It went together easily and it has changed the way we do laundry. My husband now carries his dirty things from the bedroom all the way into the utility room every night and sorts them himself. I told him to take care of emptying the pockets and turning things the way he wants them washed - inside out or not, before he puts them in. No more reaching inside dirty socks or having to over-handle the clothes. When on of the bags fills up, I run the load. No more marathon laundry days!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Schug

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy duty as I had thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy duty as I had thought it would be. Very easy to assemble, and overall nice, not rickety. Others were less expensive, and touted being “heavy duty”, I guess I assumed because it was more, it would be much sturdier. Still a very nice cart for keeping laundry sorted.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta S.

customer_reviews.title: Lets me be an efficient laundry lady!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to make my laundry room super functional. Realized that my sweet new main floor laundry room off the kitchen didn’t have the floor space that my old basement dungeon did to sort laundry into giant piles on the ground (thank God), so I needed a system to sort clothes before they get to the laundry room. This is pretty great quality from what I can tell, I don’t foresee the bags ripping or anything. I sort into lights, darks, and whites, and can get two loads into each bag if I have to. Slides nicely into the space under my counter and rolls great from room to room. And- it’s pretty, amirite?
customer_reviews.author: K. Hund

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these carts and am pleased with them. They are also easy to assemble (just make sure you tighten all of the screws). I was a little concerned about how stable they would be but they have a nice solid feel. The bags have an odor so if you are sensitive to that sort of thing, you might want to let them air out for a day or two before you put them in their final location.
customer_reviews.author: James Outlaw, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Deco Brothers for a Sturdy Cart
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble, strong canvas-like laundry bags with a functional use. I love this laundry cart that I quickly assembled myself with the help of a single screwdriver. Clear, simple self explainatory directions with a look and do diagragm. I have it sitting in my laundry room and when I change the bed sheets it comes in handy to roll it from room to room collecting the soiled sheets as I go. Highly recommend this over all the others I have seen on this site.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts - Easily Resolved
customer_reviews.text: I order this item a few months ago to use when out laundry room renovation was complete. I put it together today and it only came with 5 bag handles instead of 6, which pretty much renders it useless as far as a 3 bag laundry sorter. What a disappointment and a waste of money. Very dissatisfied. Update: I contacted customer service and they sent me a new handle immediately. Very impressed with the quality and sturdiness of this product and the excellent customer service I received. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: PLee

customer_reviews.title: Good, Well Made 3 bag Laundry Cart
customer_reviews.text: We love this laundry sorter cart! Three great sized canvas bins sitting in a heavy duty frame. Everything about this product is good quality. In addition, the bottom of the frame has a bar across the center for additional stability of the bins. And the wheels are not some dinky things that wobble or don't move properly. They are oversized with a lever to keep it from rolling off. When I initially opened the box I thought "holy cow" there are a lot of parts here; however, it was a snap to put together and took about 10 minutes. We are very happy with this purchase and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any home
customer_reviews.text: Finally my family knows how to put laundry INSIDE the basket! This product makes doing the laundry less of a chore. Clothes get separated as the go into the basket as opposed to tipping out the basket and sorting prior to washing. The product itself is very well made and sturdy. The individual bags can easily be removed and replaced. The frame is made of heavy duty metal. Even when full, it is very light to move around. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received the DecoBros Heavy-Duty 3-Bag Laundry Sorter Cart within a week of ordering it. It was very easy to assemble and I can't wait to use it. It rolls easily from our bedroom to the laundry room. This cart will make laundry day so much easier as I will no longer have to make several trips between the two rooms to do my weekly laundry chore.
customer_reviews.author: Sisty

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry sorter!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laundry sorter -- the frame and bags are very durable and well-constructed, and having this makes doing laundry so much easier/faster since all the laundry is pre-sorted (and one full bag is pretty much equal to a load of laundry, which streamlines the laundry process as well). The reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the bags had a strong, rubber odor for a while -- even after being washed and aired out. It was only after a week or so that the smell started to dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Yang

customer_reviews.title: Super duper awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Oh wish i got one of these years ago has made laundry room orginization easier no more shuffeling many baskets at once and dealing with clothes pliles on the floor as dirty laundry comes i throw it in the appropriate cubby and ready to roll. Was a very easy assemly and is made of good quality heavy canvas material thinking when i redo the laundry room i could use another as my family accumulates a lot od different types of laundry.
customer_reviews.author: OutlawGal

customer_reviews.title: Great portable sorting cart
customer_reviews.text: This sorter bag cart is just what I needed. I replaced one that had become wobbly and the canvas bag was torn. I was a little intimidated by the size of the small box that contained the item but it assembled easily. This cart is sturdy, durable and rolls easily. I love the individual canvas sorters with handles which are very easy to remove and just dump the clothes in the washer. I've recommended this item to two family members because I am so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is not made of plastic like everything else. It's very nice. The frame is metal. The casters allow you to pull it where you need it, and the bags are made of a durable substantial canvas. I sort my dirty laundry into light medium and dark loads. I love that I can put the clean folded laundry in these bags and carry them up the 2 flights of steps. So much better that that big plastic cheap laundry basket whose handles break after about two months that you buy at Target.
customer_reviews.author: natureluvr

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: The laundry bags initially had a strong chemical odor, but it faded within a few days. I wish they were machine washable, which is why I'm giving only 4/5 stars, but hand washing is probably necessary to maintain their shape. Our sorter is out in the garage, so I'm not as worried about appearance as I am in space saving, but it is a nice looking sorter. The frame is very sturdy and works great for our purpose...takes up less space than 3 separate baskets. The baskets hold a lot of laundry. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: hemielke

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the sturdiness. I've had 2 previous ones and both had a lot of plastic parts that did not last long behind a family of 4 constantly piling clothes in it. I am looking forward to a long time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: lady

customer_reviews.title: My addiction to organization has been satisfied; one for white
customer_reviews.text: My addiction to organization has been satisfied; one for white, one for regular, one for darks. I can now see instantly which load needs to be laundered without rummaging through the entire hamper. Great product. I put it together myself, which was no small feat considering my aversion to anything resembling a tool. Everything supplied with the exception of the screwdriver, but I took a few deep breaths and managed to have this thing done in less than 1/2 hour. Needed someone to hold down one side as the final pieces met together. Will purchase another one for our FL home.
customer_reviews.author: NWL

customer_reviews.title: we absolutely love it. It arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: This laundry sorter cart is replacing an older, cheaper similar item that was wobbly and laundry bags would not stay put. It was a continual source of frustration when doing laundry. We have only had the DecoBros for a few days, but so far, we absolutely love it. It arrived on time, well packaged, easy to put together. It is sturdy, moves easily, and I really love that each bag can be lifted out as needed. THANK YOU for the thoughtful construction of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Solid laundry hamper
customer_reviews.text: Vendor was 5-star. Laundry hamper looks legit. Excellent quality of canvas and the item is sturdy. I had my 12-year old put it together for me to keep her busy. :) . I like that I can sort my laundry before doing my laundry, and that I can choose to roll it to the washer or take it out with the handy-dandy handles on each bag. Definitely works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lamb13

customer_reviews.title: nice laundry sorter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cart, holding up well so far but i have had it for a couple weeks only yet. Each bag hold decent size of laundry, not too big so i don't think i can store a week's worth laundry (family of 4 with 2 toddlers) in these bags. Still they are good to sort laundry as we go through the week and i don't have clothes on my floor anymore that used to just sit there between the time i sorted laundry and got to wash everything. A nice addtion to the laundry room to keep it organized.
customer_reviews.author: minimks

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this item. Easy assembly. Sturdy casters make it easy to roll. I wasn't sure about the bags at first. The last laundry sorter I bought years ago had canvas bags, but after the first trip to the laundromat, I can say that they held up well, they carried more than expected, and the grips on the handles made it easy to carry more than one bag at the same time. I also appreciate how easy it is to get the bags back in the rack. Overall a vast improvement over the last laundry sorter I had.
customer_reviews.author: Leah R

customer_reviews.title: An Easy Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I've had this a year and a half now, and I am still extremely pleased! The quality of the canvas bags and their construction is top notch! The overall construction is excellent (though I remember having a little trouble getting pieces to align perfectly, but that hasn't hurt anything). I can't imagine someone not being 5-Star-Thrilled with this hamper! Easy to assemble, rolls around like a dream, sturdy and large canvas bags, and it got extra items off the floor and instantly sorted. Plus, it's nice looking! An easy Five Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Techy

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: We just received this last night and so far, very impressed! Assembly was simple and quick, the bags are sturdy and it looks very nice. Edit: we have had this hamper for about two years now. After less than a year, the wheels that lock gradually stopped working. Now they do not turn at all, no matter what position the locks are in. We've tried cleaning them and oiling them, nothing helps. It's kind of annoying because our hamper is kind of far from the laundry room so we end up carrying the bags which defeats the purpose of having a laundry cart with wheels.
customer_reviews.author: N. GV

customer_reviews.title: The opposite of "heavy duty"
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, i was a bit underwhelmed for calling something heavy duty but have any part be constructed of two or parts. The bottom bars are actually 2 pieces. The sides are 4 parts. The plastic parts that are supposed to help attach the bars together don't mount flush on either end. This makes me seriously question how this got as highly rated as it was. Someone has a picture of theirs heavily leaning toward one side and after building this, i can see how that could happen after a year's worth of use
customer_reviews.author: Clint Rutkas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality, perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I had hoped it would be. Each bag is about a full load in the washer. Construction is nice, sturdy, and heavy duty to last for years. No more carrying laundry baskets around on the main floor. Easy to put together in a few minutes with simple picture instructions. Thanks for a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: GProuse

customer_reviews.title: Thing is sturdy, well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Thing is sturdy, well constructed, rolls well....very happy with this laundry cart.... we replaced a rickety version from Target that was always falling apart and this thing is 50x better. The wheels are especially nice, they are legit industrial style wheels that roll up onto the carpet in our bed and back off down the hallway to our laundry room.... it's great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Durling

customer_reviews.title: Solves Our Problem Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This exactly fits the bill. We were looking for a laundry solution that let us sort our clothes but didn't take up much space. Each basket holds about the right amount for a load of wash. The unit fits into our closet nicely and the bags of laundry lift out easily to take downstairs to the washing machine. One note - it does come in many, MANY parts and ASSEMBLY IS REQUIRED.
customer_reviews.author: HalKid2

customer_reviews.title: PARTS WERE MISSING
customer_reviews.text: I did put the laundry sorter together, but the washers were missing so I had to go to Lowe's to find some replacements. The original box was broken into and torn up and the washers were taken out as well as protective coverings for other parts removed. Then it was inspected and was reboxed by Amazon all with those parts missing. Amazon did a poor job of inspection!
customer_reviews.author: m. walker

customer_reviews.title: I love this clothes hamper/sorter
customer_reviews.text: I love this clothes hamper/sorter. It is very sturdy. I have had a few different brands and this one beats them all. I have always had to use glue to hold my past ones together and this is so nice and sturdy. I would definitely buy this again. Its also easy to push to the laundry room if carrying heavy loads are hard for you. Bags are made of nice material and hold up really well when I wash them. Thanks again. If I ever need another hamper/sorter this will be my go-to.
customer_reviews.author: BrookeLynn

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get one of these earlier?!!?
customer_reviews.text: Sorting laundry is a mess that often ends up with a bunch of clothes on the floor when I look for particular articles of clothing to put in a single wash. This helps make the process easier. It was easy to put together (put it together while watching an episode of my favorite show) and seems sturdy. I've only had it for a couple of days, but I will provide an update after using it for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing yet only thing I would like is an ...
customer_reviews.text: Greatest thing yet only thing I would like is an extra bag for my towels or if I wouldve seen the one with the clothes bar! Maybe if I could add those both to my existing one I know i would! But I have five kids and this helps make sorting clothes so much easier they take part in it now with this. I also live in a small apartment and it fits perfectly in my extremely small kitchen with my stackable washer dryer
customer_reviews.author: Ken K.

customer_reviews.title: DecoBros made it great
customer_reviews.text: I am changing an earlier review that described strong smelling bags...The DecoBros offered to send new bags immediately and were wonderful to work with. This is one of the best sellers on Amazon that I have purchased from. The cart is strong, has amazing high quality wheels, and looks great. I will buy more stuff from DecoBros since they were so proactive about my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this product but unfortunately I did not
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product but unfortunately I did not, and ended up tossing in the recycle bin. The canvas bags have a horrible chemical smell. I let them air out for a day with no luck. I then washed them twice in the washing machine and again the smell was so strong I couldn't even walk into my bedroom. I ended up putting the bags in the garage for a week and still the smell was so horrible the garage smelled something awful. I would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: There are reasons this is a best seller....
customer_reviews.text: This is much sturdier and larger than a lot of less expensive sorters I considered. Metal frame is substantial and will likely hold up well. Canvas bags are very thick and sturdy. If you are considering other sorters, please check the dimensions to make sure you aren't surprised by something smaller than you had hoped for. Of course, always read the reviews too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather E. House

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel like I have to handle this gently as I'm sorting ...
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a heavy-duty laundry sorter. It has withstood many loads of laundry and is as solid as ever. The casters on the bottom are strong and high quality. The bags are made of a thick heavy material and I have no worries of the bags splitting or falling apart due to heavy use. I don't feel like I have to handle this gently as I'm sorting laundry and moving the cart around during laundry day. We liked it so much we bought a second!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cart, excellent service!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laundry sorter cart for 1.5 years now. It works perfectly (except the mild shearing of the cart in one direction when you're pulling it -- which doesn't affect it's functionality). However, I just noticed a small tear in one of my bags and contacted the seller. They were extremely prompt and immediately shipped me a replacement bag! Quite impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Dheeraj Chakilam

customer_reviews.title: Separated them all! No more undies with Jeans! No more missing buttons!
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent! My first day having it and I am already hooked! Sturdy, well made, easy to assemble and fantastic space saver! Get yourself one. I currently live in a matchbox and this hamper is so so much better than the plastic one I had! And it has wheels! Wheels! DecoBros, I do hope you guys continue to design products for people who live in limited spaces! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this sorter.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very pleased with this sorter. I would have given it five stars, but there are a couple of rough spots where the top and bottom frame fit together that can snag any laundry that happens to catch on them. The cart is super-heavy duty, with nice big rubber tires that don't leave marks on my hardwood floors. The bags are sturdy and hold their shape well and are good and deep and they hold lots of laundry. The frame is a nice gleaming chrome, and should last forever. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Home

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well made. The bags are made of fabric similar to what used to be used for beach bags, so if laundry is damp it won't seep through the bags and leave water stains. There are also support bars on the bottom so heavy bags will have something to rest on if necessary. Wheels appear solid. (The last type of cart I bought gradually 'shed' its ball bearings over time, leaving the wheels less-and-less mobile.) All things considered, this one's a winner!! Thanks, DecoBros!
customer_reviews.author: J. McCall

customer_reviews.title: This cart has really made laundry easy. I used it for whites
customer_reviews.text: This cart has really made laundry easy. I used it for whites, darks, and dry cleaning. I can wheel it right into the walk in closet when I want it out of sight, and wheel it right down the hall to the laundry room when it is full.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bonds

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in October 2016 and in less than a year, the stitching is coming apart from the weight of the laundry. All theee bags are coming apart, so I know it's not because I missused one over the other three. Very disappointed. Going to context manufacturer for refund because likely replacement would put me inthrbdame spot 6 months from now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy This for Your Totally Lazy Man
customer_reviews.text: This thing has changed my life for the better, or it at least made my husband not so incredibly lazy (he sucks so much at laundry, I get stuck with it all). Seriously, this sucker is super sturdy, and a really full bag fits into my front loading washer totally full. Because I'm weird about laundry sorting (darks, whites, colors, reds, yellows/beige), I wish there was a 5-bag sorting one, but oh well! Maybe I'll just buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Amberg

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice though, but essentially useless
customer_reviews.text: The frame leans to one side. I tried tightening the screws, with no help. The problem seems to be with the the other attachments that just fit together, so there is nothing to tighten.... Looks nice though, but essentially useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am always skeptical about laundry carts. The one I have seen/bought are usually cheap & flimsy. This one is sturdy and very high quality. Simple to put together - a bonus. You can't go wrong with this one. It is a little more expensive but you get value for your money. I have to admit that I am not using this as a laundry sorter. I was looking for a way to store bags of pet food for easy access and portability This fit the bill perfectly.I plan to buy another one for upstairs and maybe even one to use as a laundry sorter. Probably buy this for wedding and house warming gifts too.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Klapper

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty product
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the cart very easily. It is well made with durable materials. The wheels are heavy duty not the plastic one like on an office chair. My 4 year old pushed it around full of laundry and it was easily maneuvered around the house. It is light enough for a child to push and pull, but strong enough to hold 6 loads of laundry (2 loads per bag). The bags are durable too, strong canvas with metal handles so that it is easy to carry out. I love this cart and will recommend to anyone who wants a more organized laundry basket that transports easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cart!
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty awesome set up. The frame is sturdy, bags hold about 2 loads of laundry each (if you pack it down a tad bit) and it rolls smoothly. The color was true to picture and directions were easy enough to follow. I really like the bottom frame supports, a lot of the other ones don't have that. The only thing it doesn't have that I would have is different colored bags and a frame other than chrome. Those are cosmetic things that I can change myself though. Overall a great product that I have no issues with at all and I am glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: JanP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Cart is sturdy, easy to put together, the wheels roll well due to the rubber coating, and each bag holds enough for a full load of laundry in our XL capacity washer. It makes it so easy to grab a bag when it's full and wash a load during the week without have to empty and sort a whole hamper! Even my husband, who was skeptical about the whole idea, admitted it has really cut down laundry duties on the weekends. From a mom of a busy family of 5, I love it...and its easy to roll the cart to the laundry room instead of carrying a heavy hamper!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: How did it get the good reviews?
customer_reviews.text: First of all the whole material doesn't look for heavy duty at all. Secondly, too holes on the bar were defective, didn't bite the screws at all. Same as other low reviews says, I don't understand how could it get so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Yingnan

customer_reviews.title: Saves your back!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in order to not lug heavy laundry baskets to the laundry room. Now, I roll the cart smoothly across the house and the laundry is sorted with the 3 cloth bins. You're able to remove each bin and dump into the washer. Both a back and time saver! Very sturdy, easy to assemble in minutes, and the rubber wheels are great to smoothly roll across tile or carpet!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Just want a working laundry basket that is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Received this product end of September. The Cart was crooked and leaned to the RIGHT side, I wasn't too worried about this at first. However, within a few days of having this product, one of the 3 laundry bags split/was undone from where the stitching is for the bar to connect on the cart. Oct 10 2nd of the 3rd laundry bags did the exact same. The laundry bags were not overfilled, or containing heavy clothing/articles in them. Called amazon to complain and ask for 2 bags to be sent, instead having to send the product back and have to have it in a box and be picked up at home. Just want a working laundry basket that is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice big bags and a sturdy frame
customer_reviews.text: This ended up larger than I anticipated, but it's very sturdy and so convenient. My laundry is downstairs, so being able to just grab the bag and take it down is great. I use the bags to split up my laundry into darks, lights, and delicates and they're the perfect size for a week of laundry. It comes in a flat box and you need to put it together, but it's easy to do. Just be sure to tighten down the connecting screws to get it to be very sturdy. If it wobbles a bit when you first put it together, just go around the frame tightening the screws and it'll firm up.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Tighten the screws
customer_reviews.text: This was a great system and relatively easy to put together...unfortunately it never worked out for me. No matter how much I tightened the screws, it was alway loose and would jiggle side to side when I moved it, which was rare. Once the bags were full, it also was difficult to lift. I have since dismantled it and looking to find it a better home. I would recommend for someone who needs to keep garments separate and has the spaces to do so, but not great for small spaces and hopefully they can fix the wiggling issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks okay, but cheap garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made frame. The screws that hold it together thread into cheap nylon nutserts and won't stay tight. The bags are durable, but stink to high heaven of chemicals for the first two months. I'll make my own frame to replace the one that is falling apart after minimal use, the bags I will reuse now that they're done stinking. It's just a shame when products look the part but are so poorly manufactured that they can't even modestly perform their essential function. Don't bother with this one, you'd be better off making your own.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Is it weird to say that I'm in love with a laundry sorter? Because I'm in love with this one! The customer service is top notch, I had a wheel that wasn't rolling and they sent out a new one in a matter of days. It's sturdy. It's not cheap looking. The wheel locks really make it stay put. And the bags are exactly one wash load size making it super easy to know when I need to do laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Rica

customer_reviews.title: Over 2 years and still standing strong!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper organizer! I've had it for over 2 years and is still in great condition. I have previously bought a hamper organizer from Bed bath and beyond that the frame was more of a plastic material that hardly lasted 6 months before the frame bent. Annoyed, I threw that one away and decided to get this one from Amazon instead. Very glad I did. It's even held up through my toddlers multiple attempts to use it as her riding cart ☺. When i first looked at the bags, i was worried they wouldn't be big enough. Each bag holds a full load of laundry and I have a large washer!
customer_reviews.author: Allyoung

customer_reviews.title: Good for now.
customer_reviews.text: On my laundry days, I had intended to move this cart from my closet to my laundry room. But the cart tends to slant if I pull it from one room to the other. I'm worried the cart will collapse if I move it too much. So, now I just remove the bags by the handles. On a positive note, I really like the removable bags with handles -- and I don't have to worry about sorting laundry anymore. I just wish the cart was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DecoBros Heavy-Duty 3-Bag Laundry Sorter Cart, Chrome
product_meta.description: DecoBros Laundry sorter help you to sort different types, color of clothes.
feature_bullets: Product Dimensions: 30.75" W x 18" D x 33" H
Laundry bag dimensions: 15" W x 9" D x 21.5" H
Durable chromed metal frame w/ 2 inch heavy duty easily glide caster

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,573 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
